description: A dataset of high-quality web pages used for training GPT-2, collected from outbound links on Reddit.

data.text: The future of artificial intelligence is unfolding rapidly with new advancements.
Climate change policies are crucial to ensuring a sustainable future.
Deep learning models, such as transformers, have revolutionized natural language processing.
The history of space exploration is filled with remarkable achievements and discoveries.
Advancements in quantum computing may reshape industries in the next decade.
